Our School Health Programs aim to promote lifelong healthy eating. By teaching healthy eating habits in early childhood and adolescence we ensure optimal health, growth and intellectual development. Our program contributes to the attainment of full educational potential and good health by providing our students with the skills, social support and environmental reinforcement that is needed to adopt long-term, healthy eating behaviours.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image Our healthy snack and lunch menus offer a variety of nutritious, dietary based options, that not only aim to the good health but also taste amazing. We are all about eating proper but without missing on taste and pleasure.

We also have our school cafeterias or snack shacks which offer a variety of products which adapt to our different student needs. Giving them the option or criteria to make assertive decisions to what products fit best on their dietary plans. We encourage healthy eating but we respect choice.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” height=”557px” height_tablet=”auto” height_phone=”auto” height_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_css_main_element=”display:flex;||align-items: center;||flex-wrap: wrap;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ custom_padding=”100px|60px||60px|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|50px|50px|50px|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”20px|20px|20px|20px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_main_element=”height: 100%!important;” border_width_left=”150px” border_color_left=”#9b2320″ border_width_left_tablet=”150px” border_width_left_phone=”35px” border_width_left_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_font=”|800|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#002452″ header_2_font_size=”40px” text_orientation=”justified” max_width=”500px” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||10px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”25px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

FOOD APP

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”justified” max_width=”500px” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We are all about using technology to better control healthy eating habits in our students. Parents now have access to our food platform where they will be able to monitor which products are being consumed by their kids, contemplating calorie count and
quantity. Blocking certain product references will also be an available option if needed. And finally, they will be able to wire transfer money whenever they see fit.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Foto-4-1.jpg” title_text=”Foto 4 (1)” align=”right” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”50px||80px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”30px||30px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”30px||30px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”|800|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29″ header_2_font_size=”42px” header_2_font_size_tablet=”42px” header_2_font_size_phone=”26px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29%22:%91%22header_2_text_color%22%93}”]

MENÚ

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||20px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We will be publishing our Lunch and Snack menu on our website as well as on our Food App.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#002452″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”1280px” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;||flex-wrap: wrap;||margin-bottom: 0px!important;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”order: 2;” custom_css_main_element_phone=”order: 2;”][et_pb_image src=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/celular-mockup-1-1-1.png” title_text=”celular mockup (1) (1) (1)” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”-130px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”45px||||false|false” custom_css_main_element=”order: 1;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”|800|||||||” header_2_text_align=”left” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”42px” custom_margin=”||10px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”42px” header_2_font_size_phone=”24px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

SOCIAL MEDIA

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”1.5em” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||10px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The School’s Smart and Healthy Eating Program Internacional Altamira is a support initiative that seeks to stimulate healthy living habits in our community, through the supply of snacks and lunches with great nutritional value and excellent quality. We stand out for offering our guests fresh, balanced, handmade, healthy products, and selected according to the preferences of children.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ background_color=”#f1f1f1″ background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”VALUE PROMISE” image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Recurso-3@3x-8.png” image_icon_width=”80px” content_max_width=”100%” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|800||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#002452″ header_font_size=”37px” body_text_align=”justify” body_text_color=”#383838″ body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”2em” background_enable_color=”off” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” header_font_size_tablet=”37px” header_font_size_phone=”24px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” body_font_size_tablet=”16px” body_font_size_phone=”14px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Program is committed to encouraging healthy eating habits, demonstrating that a dish can be reinvented and transformed into a fun and nutritional experience. We believe that offering a nutritious and balanced eating experience is our differentiating factor, which allows us to educate our community and take care of your overall health.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ background_enable_color=”off” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”OUR OFFER” image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/OUR-OFFER.png” image_icon_width=”80px” content_max_width=”100%” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|800||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#002452″ header_font_size=”37px” body_text_align=”justify” body_text_color=”#383838″ body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”2em” background_enable_color=”off” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” header_font_size_tablet=”37px” header_font_size_phone=”24px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” body_font_size_tablet=”16px” body_font_size_phone=”14px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

HEALTHY SNACK

Our snacks are made up of: a carbohydrate, a protein, a natural juice and a portion of fruit. We oer handmade products, free of preservatives and nutritious.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ background_color=”#F1F1F1″ background_enable_image=”off” Our Lunches are made up of:
Composition of each Lunch:

120 g of carbohydrate, 100-120 g of protein, 60-80 g of salad
1 unit natural juice of seven ounces.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ background_color=”#9b2320″ background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Recurso-6@3x-8.png” image_icon_width=”80px” content_max_width=”100%” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|800||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#353535″ header_font_size=”20px” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_font_size=”20px” body_line_height=”2em” background_enable_color=”off” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” body_font_size_tablet=”20px” body_font_size_phone=”14px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

excerpt.rendered: Our School Health Programs aim to promote lifelong healthy eating. By teaching healthy eating habits in early childhood and adolescence we ensure optimal health, growth and intellectual development. Our program contributes to the attainment of full educational potential and good health by providing our students with the skills, social support and environmental reinforcement that is needed to adopt long-term, healthy eating behaviours.Our healthy snack and lunch menus offer a variety of nutritious, dietary based options, that not only aim to the good health but also taste amazing. We are all about eating proper but without missing on taste and pleasure. We also have our school cafeterias or snack shacks which offer a variety of products which adapt to our different student needs. Giving them the option or criteria to make assertive decisions to what products fit best on their dietary plans. We encourage healthy eating but we respect choice.FOOD APPWe are all about using technology to better control healthy eating habits in our students. Parents now have access to our food platform where they will be able to monitor which products are being consumed by their kids, contemplating calorie count andquantity. Blocking certain product references will also be an available […]
